languages.text: "Абеляр, ты лучше взгляни на эти скопытившиеся черные жестянки. Тут и прорицать не надо — их рук дело. Они ведь насовсем подохли... верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Абеляр, ты лучше взгляни на эти скопытившиеся черные жестянки. Тут и прорицать не надо — их рук дело. Они ведь насовсем подохли... верно?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Abelard, look closer at these creepy hunks of junk. You don't need to be a seer to know what happened here — they happened. They are properly dead... aren't they?"
languages.original_text: "Абеляр, ты лучше взгляни на эти скопытившиеся черные жестянки. Тут и прорицать не надо — их рук дело. Они ведь насовсем подохли... верно?"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, look closer at these creepy hunks of junk. You don't need to be a seer to know what happened here — they happened. They are properly dead... aren't they?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “阿贝拉德，来看看这些令人毛骨悚然的废品吧。就算你不是预言家，你也能看得出来这里发生了什么事情。这些人死得可真惨……是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Abelard, look closer at these creepy hunks of junk. You don't need to be a seer to know what happened here — they happened. They are properly dead... aren't they?"

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德，来看看这些令人毛骨悚然的废品吧。就算你不是预言家，你也能看得出来这里发生了什么事情。这些人死得可真惨……是吧？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Abelard, mire bien esos montones de chatarra siniestros. No necesita ser vidente para saber lo que ha ocurrido: eso. Están muertos del todo... ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "Abelard, look closer at these creepy hunks of junk. You don't need to be a seer to know what happened here — they happened. They are properly dead... aren't they?"

traits.locale_text: «Abelard, mire bien esos montones de chatarra siniestros. No necesita ser vidente para saber lo que ha ocurrido: eso. Están muertos del todo... ¿no?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「アベラード、この不気味なガラクタの塊をよく見てみろ。ここで…彼らに何が起きたのか、預言者でなくともわかるはずだ。彼らは間違いなく死んでいる…そうだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Abelard, look closer at these creepy hunks of junk. You don't need to be a seer to know what happened here — they happened. They are properly dead... aren't they?"

traits.locale_text: 「アベラード、この不気味なガラクタの塊をよく見てみろ。ここで…彼らに何が起きたのか、預言者でなくともわかるはずだ。彼らは間違いなく死んでいる…そうだろう？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Abelard, seht euch mal diesen Müllhaufen an. Man muss kein Seher sein, um zu wissen, was hier passiert ist ... sie sind passiert. Sie sind vermutlich tot ... oder?"
languages.original_text: "Abelard, look closer at these creepy hunks of junk. You don't need to be a seer to know what happened here — they happened. They are properly dead... aren't they?"

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, seht euch mal diesen Müllhaufen an. Man muss kein Seher sein, um zu wissen, was hier passiert ist ... sie sind passiert. Sie sind vermutlich tot ... oder?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Regardez donc ces tas de ferraille de plus près, Abélard. Pas besoin d'être devin pour comprendre la situation. Ils sont morts et bien morts... n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Abelard, look closer at these creepy hunks of junk. You don't need to be a seer to know what happened here — they happened. They are properly dead... aren't they?"

traits.locale_text: « Regardez donc ces tas de ferraille de plus près, Abélard. Pas besoin d'être devin pour comprendre la situation. Ils sont morts et bien morts... n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Abelard, şu tuhaf hurda yığınlarına yakından baksana. Burada ne olduğunu anlamak için medyum olmak şart değil. Olan şey 'onlar'. Ölmüşler, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Abelard, look closer at these creepy hunks of junk. You don't need to be a seer to know what happened here — they happened. They are properly dead... aren't they?"
